entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
